snippet: Top officials expressed determination to stick with the full 1.1 trillion euros, even though the eurozone economy shows signs of finally picking up.
abstract: European Central Bank officials are determined to move forward with full 1.1 trillion euros, or $1.2 trillion, of planned stimulus, despite fact that eurozone economy is finally displaying signs of improving.
lead_paragraph: Top officials expressed determination to stick with the full 1.1 trillion euros, even though the eurozone economy shows signs of finally picking up.

headline.main: European Central Bank Firm in Backing Stimulus
headline.print_headline: European Central Bank Firm in Backing Stimulus
